Name: Export-KSVMOwner
Description: Export virtual machine owner information (custom properties) to an Excel file.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Get-KSVIEntity
Description: Get VI (virtual infrastructure) entities registered for use with this module.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Get-KSVM
Description: Search for a virtual machine across all known platforms.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Get-KSVMDiskUsage
Description: Get the disk space used by a virtual machine managed by a vCenter server.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Set-KSVMCustomProperty
Description: Set a custom property on a Virtual Machine managed by SCVMM.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Set-KSVMOwner
Description: Set owner information for a specific virtual machine.
Author: Chris Dent

Name: Test-KSESXCredential
Description: Test a set of credentials against an ESX server.
Author: Chris Dent
